name: Spring Break Zine
description:
This is the first zine i've made in a little while and the first one i've made using Decker. This program is really awesome, full stop. I want to make more stuff with Decker in the future, perhaps maybe more ambitious stuff like some kind of walk around thing or something... We will see!

This zine mostly contains thoughts about the video games and movies i've been going through most recently (plus some other things that are more hidden away in nooks and crannys), all made over the course of a week. This week, of course, being spring break!

Apologies for the performance of the zine in browser, I recommend downloading the .deck file and running it in Decker if the lag gets to be annoying.

Please enjoy the zine, free to download and enjoy :>
(donations immensely appreciated)
